user.title: Glance Clock Setup
user.description: Select your Glance Clock device to set up.

error.no_devices_found: No Glance Clock devices found. Make sure your device is powered on and in range.
error.device_not_found: Selected device is no longer available.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to device. Check that the device is powered on and nearby.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during setup.

abort.not_supported: This device is not a supported Glance Clock

calibration.title: Start Calibration
calibration.description: This will start the calibration process. The watch hands will move to show their current alignment. If the hands stop at 11:59 instead of 12:00 when a green segment appears, this indicates the hands are mechanically misaligned and need adjustment.

confirm_calibration.title: Adjust Watch Hands
confirm_calibration.description: If the hands stopped at 11:59 (not aligned at 12:00), carefully remove the minute hand and reposition it to align straight at 12:00. This corrects the mechanical misalignment. Click Submit once you have adjusted the hands or if no adjustment was needed.

done_calibration.title: Calibration Complete
done_calibration.description: The calibration process is complete. Your watch hands should now be properly aligned at 12:00. Click Finish to close this dialog.

clear_scenes.title: Clear Scenes
clear_scenes.description: Click Submit to clear all scenes. This action cannot be undone.

done_clear_scenes.title: Scenes Cleared
done_clear_scenes.description: All scenes have been cleared successfully. Click Finish to close this dialog.
